attributes.action: Introduce legislation that recognises Priest Ministers and Reverends of Faiths other than Protestant and Roman Catholic and gives them the same rights i.e. Allow them to legally marry couples
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For centuries only 2 religions in this country have been legally given the power to conduct weddings etc and I would like to see this widened to include Ministers, Priests, Rabbis, Imans, and Reverends of any religion to have the power to legally conduct a marriage service without the presence of a Registrar and to afford all Clergymen (and women) of whatever faith the same rights
